dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I found a data cartridge with details of UDL's secret experiments.

dialog.speaker: sanjar_nandi (Male)
dialog.utterance: Excellent timing on your part. I worked my fingers to nubs, but I've finally completed the BOLT-52 form. I daresay it will be my second-greatest achievement, after the reformations.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: You're getting ahead of yourself again.

dialog.speaker: sanjar_nandi (Male)
dialog.utterance: So I am. Do you have this cartridge?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: <Give him the UDL data.> Here you go.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Not so fast. What're these "reformations" you're talking about?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: "Reformations"? What, are you going to reformat everyone's files?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Oh, did I say I had a data cartridge? That's just what I call my left nut.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Come to think of it, maybe I don't...

dialog.speaker: sanjar_nandi (Male)
dialog.utterance: I knew there was something going on! This is exactly the proof we need - the Board will have to welcome us back now.

dialog.speaker: sanjar_nandi (Male)
dialog.utterance: I'll transmit this data along with the completed BOLT-52 right away. After that, we'll sit back and quietly wait for the Board to respond.

dialog.speaker: sanjar_nandi (Male)
dialog.utterance: I'm working on a plan to reorganize the Board. Slowly. Peacefully. And with meticulous documentation.

dialog.speaker: sanjar_nandi (Male)
dialog.utterance: But that all comes later. First, I need to submit the BOLT-52. With that data you're holding, of course.

dialog.speaker: sanjar_nandi (Male)
dialog.utterance: That's just cruel. And inefficient.

dialog.speaker: sanjar_nandi (Male)
dialog.utterance: That seems unnecessarily complicated.

dialog.speaker: Celia (Female)
dialog.utterance: It's actually very funny, sir.

dialog.speaker: sanjar_nandi (Male)
dialog.utterance: Now I'm confused. Do you have evidence against UDL or not?

dialog.speaker: sanjar_nandi (Male)
dialog.utterance: I- I don't understand. Where is it?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: <Give him the UDL data.> Relax, I'm just teasing you.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Not so fun having someone jerk your chain, is it?

dialog.speaker: sanjar_nandi (Male)
dialog.utterance: Is this about the BOLT-52? Please, I wasn't trying to mislead you.

dialog.speaker: sanjar_nandi (Male)
dialog.utterance: Anyway, I don't think I can handle this back-and-forth. I'm used to crushing disappointment, but not after having reason to hope. That makes it all considerably worse.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: <Give him the UDL data.> Calm down, I have it right here.
